name: Pigeons Vs Court
description:
**UPLOADED A BROKEN VER, PLS USE THIS COPY - https://vacantsleep.itch.io/pigeons-vs-the-court **

Oh no, you crossed the wrong soulless monster! Now him and his law firm are suing all pigeons, you must sabotage those pesky lawyers to make sure they don't file that suit!

Movement: WASD

Interact / Sabotage: E

Run: Shift
